message.body: Hey just want to say that in regards to coffee, we don't care if phoung or anyone has coffee but be mindful when there is little creamer left. We didn't have enough for our coffee for work this morning. We didn't even know it was gone and we weren't able to go food shopping bec it was late.
If we are low on something just tell us. We could have run to 7 11 last night to get more.
Oh sorry that was me. I had a cup Saturday morning and I meant to tell you but forgot.
Ok, yea anytime anything is low just us know. Text us so you don't forget. Even if you buy it and the $ borrow from a friend, we will just pay them back
Yea a lil bottle until we go food shopping. Its on the door
